dn25:15.16.pli: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṁ sante tapojigucchā parisuddhā hoti no aparisuddhā, aggappattā ca sārappattā cā”ti.
dn25:15.16.en: “Clearly, sir, it is purified. It has reached the peak and the pith.”

dn25:15.17.pli: “Na kho, nigrodha, ettāvatā tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca;
dn25:15.17.en: “No, Nigrodha, at this point the mortification in disgust of sin has not yet reached the peak and the pith.

dn25:16.1.pli: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca?
dn25:16.1.en: “But at what point, sir, does the mortification in disgust of sin reach the peak and the pith?

dn25:16.2.pli: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tapojigucchāya aggaññeva pāpetu, sāraññeva pāpetū”ti.
dn25:16.2.en: Please help me reach the peak and the pith!”

dn25:17.8.pli: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṁ sante tapojigucchā parisuddhā hoti no aparisuddhā, aggappattā ca sārappattā cā”ti.
dn25:17.8.en: “Clearly, sir, it is purified. It has reached the peak and the pith.”

dn25:17.9.pli: “Na kho, nigrodha, ettāvatā tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca;
dn25:17.9.en: “No, Nigrodha, at this point the mortification in disgust of sin has not yet reached the peak and the pith.

dn25:18.1.pli: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca?
dn25:18.1.en: “But at what point, sir, does the mortification in disgust of sin reach the peak and the pith?

dn25:18.2.pli: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tapojigucchāya aggaññeva pāpetu, sāraññeva pāpetū”ti.
dn25:18.2.en: Please help me reach the peak and the pith!”

dn25:18.16.pli: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṁ sante tapojigucchā parisuddhā hoti, no aparisuddhā, aggappattā ca sārappattā cā”ti.
dn25:18.16.en: “Clearly, sir, it is purified. It has reached the peak and the pith.”

dn25:18.17.pli: “Na kho, nigrodha, ettāvatā tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca;
dn25:18.17.en: “No, Nigrodha, at this point the mortification in disgust of sin has not yet reached the peak and the pith.

dn25:19.1.pli: “Kittāvatā pana, bhante, tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca?
dn25:19.1.en: “But at what point, sir, does the mortification in disgust of sin reach the peak and the pith?

dn25:19.2.pli: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā tapojigucchāya aggaññeva pāpetu, sāraññeva pāpetū”ti.
dn25:19.2.en: Please help me reach the peak and the pith!”

dn25:19.15.pli: “Addhā kho, bhante, evaṁ sante tapojigucchā parisuddhā hoti no aparisuddhā, aggappattā ca sārappattā cā”ti.
dn25:19.15.en: “Clearly, sir, it is purified. It has reached the peak and the pith.”

dn25:19.16.pli: “Ettāvatā kho, nigrodha, tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā ca.
dn25:19.16.en: “Nigrodha, at this point the mortification in disgust of sin has reached the peak and the pith.

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 25
The Lion’s Roar at Udumbarikā’s Monastery
1. On the Wanderer Nigrodha

an3.93:5.9.pli: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu aggappatto sārappatto suddho sāre patiṭṭhito’.
an3.93:5.9.en: they’re called a mendicant who has reached the peak and the pith, being pure and grounded in the essential.

an3.93:6.13.pli: Evamassu tāni, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa dhaññāni aggappattāni sārappattāni suddhāni sāre patiṭṭhitāni.
an3.93:6.13.en: In this way that farmer’s crop would reach the peak and the pith, being pure and consisting only of what is essential.

an3.93:7.4.pli: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu aggappatto sārappatto suddho sāre patiṭṭhito’”ti.
an3.93:7.4.en: they’re called a mendicant who has reached the peak and the pith, being pure and grounded in the essential.”
